job_tasks.phrase: Drive digital transformation by understanding client needs and crafting seamless online experiences.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to understanding business needs (client needs) and translating them into strategic actions (crafting seamless online experiences) to achieve a business objective (digital transformation).

job_tasks.phrase: Take charge of strategic recommendations and elevate our app and web services.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights strategic thinking and decision-making aimed at improving business offerings.

job_tasks.phrase: You achieve this by translating customer needs into value propositions and comprehensive end-to-end solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of understanding customer needs and developing business solutions, aligning with business strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: ensuring they are aligned with the latest developments in technology, digitalization, legislation, and regulations.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a need to understand the broader business and regulatory environment to inform strategy and solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Additionally, you consider the requirements and frameworks set by both internal and external stakeholders, including development teams and regulatory bodies.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes understanding and incorporating stakeholder needs and external frameworks into business strategy and solution design.

job_tasks.phrase: We are responsible for Internet Banking, the ABN AMRO app and new digital initiatives.
job_tasks.justification: This defines the business domain and strategic focus areas of the team.

job_tasks.phrase: We know one thing about the future of banking: it is all about being a personal bank in a digital age.
job_tasks.justification: This statement reflects a strategic understanding of the business's future direction and market positioning.

job_tasks.phrase: Our digital channels play a key role: not only showing our customers their transactions, but also in helping them make the right decisions with personalized content.
job_tasks.justification: This describes a strategic approach to leveraging digital channels for customer engagement and decision support.

job_tasks.phrase: That is why we work hard at ABN AMRO to bring our services to the digital environment, offering customers the seamless digital experience they deserve.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights a strategic business goal of enhancing customer experience through digital services.

job_tasks.phrase: We are looking for a Digital Business Developer with an affinity for customer experience, who wants to bring our digital offering (app and web) to the next level!
job_tasks.justification: This reiterates the focus on business strategy and improving digital product offerings based on customer experience.

soft_skills.phrase: You will be part of a specialized team with other Business Developers.
soft_skills.justification: Indicates working within a team structure.

soft_skills.phrase: You will work in a pool of Business Developers with a dedicated focus on one of the teams within the Grid.
soft_skills.justification: Implies collaboration within a pool and dedicated teams.

soft_skills.phrase: Here you will be part of a scrum team using an Agile way of working:
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly states working within a scrum team, which requires collaboration and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: Being part of four multidisciplinary dev-ops teams.
soft_skills.justification: Highlights working in multidisciplinary teams, requiring strong collaboration and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: Working together as a dynamic multi-cultural team.
soft_skills.justification: Emphasizes teamwork and collaboration in a diverse environment.

soft_skills.phrase: An environment that simulates to embrace failures as a necessary step to learn quickly.
soft_skills.justification: Suggests a culture that encourages learning from mistakes, implying adaptability and a growth mindset.

soft_skills.phrase: Drive digital transformation by understanding client needs and crafting seamless online experiences.
soft_skills.justification: Implies taking initiative and ownership to drive transformation.

soft_skills.phrase: Take charge of strategic recommendations and elevate our app and web services.
soft_skills.justification: Indicates taking ownership and leadership in strategic decision-making.

soft_skills.phrase: If creating customer-centric solutions excites you, this is your chance to make a difference!
soft_skills.justification: Suggests a proactive approach and a desire to make an impact, aligning with innovation and ownership.

soft_skills.phrase: We are looking for a Digital Business Developer with an affinity for customer experience, who wants to bring our digital offering (app and web) to the next level!
soft_skills.justification: Expresses a desire for someone proactive who wants to drive improvements, indicating innovation and ownership.

soft_skills.phrase: For job related questions you can contact Manouk Klaassen (a.i. Lead PO Business Developer Pool).
soft_skills.justification: Provides a contact point for job-related inquiries, implying a communication channel.

soft_skills.phrase: Truly surprising insights and innovative solutions for our clients result from an interplay of cultures, knowledge and experience. Diversity is therefore extremely important to our organisation.
soft_skills.justification: Highlights the value of diverse perspectives and collaboration for generating insights and solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: To ensure that everyone at ABN AMRO can develop their talents, we encourage an inclusive culture in which all colleagues feel engaged and appreciated.
soft_skills.justification: Promotes an inclusive culture that fosters engagement and appreciation, which are key to effective collaboration and communication.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement describes a 'Digital Business Developer' role focused on understanding client needs, crafting online experiences, making strategic recommendations, and improving digital channels (app & web). There is no mention of AI/ML tasks, models, or technologies. The core responsibilities fall under business strategy and product development, not AI/ML specialization or software engineering related to AI.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the nature of the role, explicitly stating it's a 'Digital Business Developer' and detailing responsibilities related to business strategy, client needs, and digital channel improvement. There is no ambiguity or mention of AI/ML, making the classification straightforward.
